body_html:
This is actually interesting; looks like some of the checkpoints are corrupted identically, but most are different (and one of the eight checkpoints is not corrupted).

body:
This is actually interesting; looks like some of the checkpoints are corrupted identically, but most are different (and one of the eight checkpoints is _not_ corrupted).
